text: Ri Kun-mo (5 April 1926 â€“ 2001) was a North Korean politician (CND). He was Prime Minister from 29 December 1986 to 12 December 1988. He resigned in 1988 due to poor health. He succeeded Kang Song-san. His successor was Yon Hyong Muk. ==References== Category:1926 births Category:2001 deaths Category:Prime ministers of North Korea
title: Ri Kun-mo
